super_feature_description: Handles all aspects of user accounts, including authentication, profiles, permissions, and security.

sub_features.description: Allows users to authenticate using their email and a password.
Supports authentication via Google, Facebook, and other providers.
Enhances security by requiring a second authentication step.
Handles user sessions and automatic logouts.
Enables users to reset their password via email or SMS.

super_feature_description: Handles all transactions, including subscriptions, one-time purchases, refunds, and financial reporting.
feature_description: Manages user subscriptions, including plan upgrades and downgrades.

sub_features.description: Allows users to choose a subscription plan.
Manages free trial periods before billing starts.
Enables users to cancel their subscriptions.
Sends email alerts for upcoming payments or failed transactions.

super_feature_description: Handles content creation, editing, organization, and access control.
feature_description: Allows users to create and edit content for the platform.

sub_features.description: Provides a WYSIWYG editor for text formatting and multimedia embedding.
Allows users to save drafts before publishing.
Provides predefined templates for structuring content.
Supports multiple users editing the same content with real-time updates.
Allows users to schedule content for automatic publishing.
